heroSubtitle: Purpose-built software solutions designed to streamline your operations
intro: Beyond managed IT services, we develop specialized software products that address real industry challenges. Our products are built from hands-on experience working with businesses just like yours.

products.name: qMechanic
products.description: qMechanic is a comprehensive digital platform designed specifically for HGV workshops and fleet operators. It streamlines vehicle inspections, manages job cards, and keeps your compliance documentation organised and accessible.

features.title: Digital Inspections
features.description: Complete DVSA-compliant inspections on tablet or mobile with photo capture and digital signatures

features.title: Job Card Management
features.description: Create, assign, and track repair jobs from start to finish with full audit trails

features.title: Defect Tracking
features.description: Log and monitor vehicle defects with severity ratings and resolution tracking

features.title: Compliance Reports
features.description: Generate inspection reports and compliance documentation instantly

features.title: Fleet Overview
features.description: Dashboard view of your entire fleet's maintenance status and upcoming inspections

features.title: Workshop Scheduling
features.description: Plan and schedule workshop capacity and technician assignments

products.name: qHaul
products.description: qHaul is our upcoming transport management system designed to give haulage operators complete control over their operations. From job booking to proof of delivery, qHaul streamlines every aspect of transport management.

features.title: Job Management
features.description: Book, schedule, and manage transport jobs with customer and load details

features.title: Driver App
features.description: Mobile app for drivers with job details, navigation, and digital POD capture

features.title: Real-Time Tracking
features.description: Live visibility of vehicle locations and job status updates

features.title: Customer Portal
features.description: Self-service portal for customers to book jobs and track deliveries

features.title: Invoicing Integration
features.description: Automatic invoice generation based on completed jobs and rates

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Insights into fleet utilisation, revenue, and operational efficiency

benefits: Reduce admin time with automated invoicing
